Seqtools Changes/Fixes [from git]
  • Browse CVS
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-15: Merge branch 'feature/shortread'
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-15: Fixed a bug where dotter fails if pfetch returns 'no match'
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-15: When sorting alignments by position, also do a secondary sort by length
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-15: Fixed an issue where the 'squash matches' option on the settings dialog was not updated after changing the same setting on the toolbar
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Incremented version to 4.2 (start of new versioning system)
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Merge branch 'feature/shortread'
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Improvements to message handling for region-fetch code
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Fixed an issue with squashed matches where the row was not always highlighted correctly for selected/grouped matches
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Small comment addition
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Added toolbar icon for squash-matches option
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Improved display name for short reads when 'squash matches' is enabled
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Fixed an issue where a selected short-read could be hidden by its duplicates in 'squashed matches' mode
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-14: Finished work to group short-reads
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-13: WIP: implement a better way of grouping duplicate short reads
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-13: Fixed an issue with the names of duplicated short reads being lost
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-13: Fixed a bug where the region-fetch script args were not being picked up from config
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-13: Fixed a compile error on Macs (missing include file)
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-13: Fixed a compile error on Linux due to missing include file
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-13: Merge branch 'feature/shortread'
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: Fixed a bug where the coverage view labels were sometimes not drawn correctly
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: Added squash-matches command-line argument
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: By default, set the secondary sort column to be position
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: Added show-coverage command-line argument
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: Report an error if the region-fetch script fails
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: The range requested by region-fetch is now clipped to the display range
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: Tidied the regino-fetch code
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: Added the --save-temp-files command-line argument
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: Keep original name for short reads so that we can identify pairs (until we have a better method of doing so)
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-10: GFF parser now ignores features that are outside the reference sequence range
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-07: Merge branch 'feature/shortread'
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-07: Delete temp files after doing a region-fetch
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-07: region-fetch now gets its script arguments from the config file on a per-source basis
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-03: Merge branch 'feature/buildsys'
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-03: Removed --dirty option from git describe because it's not available in older versions of git
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-03: Use abbreviated commit ids in build info
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-03: Removed unused expression in configure.ac
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-03: Fixed a bug in the build system where AM_COND_IF is not recognised in older versions of automake
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-03: Merge branch 'feature/buildsys'
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-03: Build system now includes git-describe info in the version number
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-02: Incremented version to 4.1.20
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-02: Added --dataset argument
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-01: Fixed a bug with creating temp files for region-fetch
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-06-01: Merge branch 'shortread'
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-05-31: Fixed a bug where the parser was not ignoring blank lines
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-05-31: Added the real script arguments for the bam-fetch script
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-05-27: Added code to distinguish short-read matches from other match types
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-05-27: Fixed a bug where parsing a secondary input file was not adding the sequences correctly
  • Gemma Barson - 2011-05-27: Blixem region-fetch now calls the script specified in the config file
